piercing.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone with piercing eyes is looking at you and seems to know what you are thinking
piercing.translation[0].definitions[0].e: There was mockery now in those piercing blue eyes.
She felt foolish and unsure under his piercing gaze.
He gave her a piercing look.
piercing.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a sound that is piercing is high, sharp, and unpleasant
piercing.translation[0].definitions[1].e: He grinned and let out a piercing whistle.
piercing.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a piercing wind is very cold
piercing.translation[0].definitions[3].e: She felt a piercing sensation in her arm.
piercing.translation[0].definitions[4].d: affecting your feelings very deeply in a sad way
piercing.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a hole made through part of your body so that you can put jewellery there, or the process of making these holes
